views.markdown:
3.0 Changelog -Now compatible with Siri app suggestions -No longer shows the glyph when pulling past the Today view -Optimised codebase Thanks for using this tweak, check me out on twitter @candoizo to see more of my tweaks :) 2.0.1 -> 2.0.2

-landscape support
-slightly smarter

thanks for installing
2.0.1 -removes old files (smaller size)

1.0.2-1 -> 2.0 changes: Tweak has been completely rewritten, includes

-Respring is NOT needed when changing preferences
-New preference page
-initial ColorFlow3 compatibility
-Useless features removed
-Auto-adjusts in accordance with light/dark backgrounds
-Many under-the-hood optimizations
-New icon

many hours of hard work went into this update, and many more are still to come, consider supporting me if you enjoy this tweak & hope to see future improvements
1.0.2-1 changelog

-This hotfix brings proper spacing to users who use tweaks that disable their Today view, please report any other issues noticed.

*************************************************
A cheat code has been added, but it's not listed anywhere? You have to be a star and find the power to discover it yourself!
